params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\" AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"WH_CD\\" AS \\"WH_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ACPT_NO\\" AS \\"ACPT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ACPT_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\" AS \\"ACPT_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"INSPEC_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\" AS \\"INSPEC_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" AS \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\" AS \\"PARTIAL_PRD_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"OPR_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\" AS \\"OPR_RSLT_CRCT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\" AS \\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\" AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\" AS \\"DEFECT_CAUSE_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"STOCK_UPD_TYP\\" AS \\"STOCK_UPD_TYP\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\" AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"CREATED_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS \\"CREATED_DATE\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"CREATED_BY\\" AS \\"CREATED_BY\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_BEFORE_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_BEFORE_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_AFTER_QTY\\", 'FM999999999999999990.0999') AS \\"RCV_ISSUE_AFTER_QTY\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM.\\"NON_PLANNED_CAUSE_CD\\" AS \\"NON_PLANNED_CAUSE_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" DECODE(T_RCV_ISSUE.RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP,'12',T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM.NON_PLANNED_CAUSE_CD,'22',T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM.NON_PLANNED_CAUSE_CD,T_RCV_ISSUE.RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT) AS RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"LOT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"l_SHIP_ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"LOT_NO\\" AS \\"l_INV_LOT_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" T_RCV_ISSUE, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM, " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_CD\\" = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM.RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"WH_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\" >= ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\" <= ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"LOT_NO\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\" <> ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"CREATED_DATE\\" DESC"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" T_RCV_ISSUE, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_WH, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM, " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"WHERE " +" T_RCV_ISSUE.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_CD\\" = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = T_RCV_ISSUE_ITEM.RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD(+) " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"WH_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\" >= ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\" <= ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"LOT_NO\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\" <> ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

cell.name: w_CHOICE
cell.description: 入出庫区分の選択判定用

cell.description: 入出庫完了フラグ コンボボックス表示名

cell.name: h_PLANT_CD
cell.description: ログインユーザーの工場コード
